lock-scroll.description: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Overlay when disabled will not cause the body to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否禁用滚动穿透，禁用时滚动叠加不会导致正文滚动

teleport.description: The location of the Overlay to mount
teleport.description_zh: 要挂载的叠加层的位置

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the overlay
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: 是否支持键盘ESC关闭叠加

events.name: key-escape
events.description_zh: 单击键盘 ESC 时触发
